text: splist character vector containing names bird species search . Names can include minor variations typos. max_distance Numeric. maximum allowable distance fuzzy matching, can either proportion (0 < max_distance < 1) integer representing maximum number allowed differences. Defaults 0.1.

title: Search for Bird Species Data in the Birds of Peru Dataset — search_avesperu
text: data frame following columns: name_submitted species name provided input. accepted_name closest matching species name dataset, NA match found. order_name taxonomic order species. family_name taxonomic family species. english_name common name species English. spanish_name common name species Spanish. status conservation status species. dist computed distance submitted name matched name.

title: Search for Bird Species Data in the Birds of Peru Dataset — search_avesperu
text: function performs following steps: Validates input, ensuring splist character vector factor. Standardizes species names identifies duplicate entries list. unique species name, searches matches dataset using approximate string matching (agrep), customizable max_distance. Retrieves taxonomic common name data closest matching species. matches found species, corresponding row output contain NA values.
